actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on United States E savings bonds received by individuals who have attained age 65.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the interest on any United States series E Savings bonds paid or accrued during the taxable year to an individual who has attained age 65.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income the interest on United States E savings bonds received by individuals who have attained age 65.
